45. $\cfrac{yx-x^2-y+1}{x-1}=0\Leftrightarrow \cfrac{y(x-1)-(x-1)(x+1)}{x-1}=0\Leftrightarrow \cfrac{(x-1)(y-x-1)}{x-1}=0
\Leftrightarrow y=x+1,\ x\neq1.$
$$$$% TIKZ_ID{9_klass_utf8-chapter006-045-solution-diag001.svg}
